About Us

About Me

My name is Ryan, and I am a student at Innovation Academy. I am currently a sophmore. I love video games, and I love AI. I am very excited to see how AI will change the video game industry in the future. I hope you enjoyed our website!

About Remy Jones

My name is Remy Jones, and I am a student at Innovation Academy. I am currently a sophomore. This project was very fun to work on, and I am excited to see how AI will change the video game industry in the future. I hope you enjoyed our website!
